MLNS Batch from LankaClear:
Primary cut-off time for third
party transactions
SLIPS Cycle 3:
Close for new transactions (for T + 0) in favour of third parties, 
except for bank-to- bank (MT2XX series).
SLF and SDF windows are closed for Participants at 1515 hrs.

MLNS Batch from LankaClear:
Cut-off time for Participant
managed ILF Repo creation
SLIPS Cycle 3: Participants  should  not  initiate  ILF  Repos after 1545 hrs.
Settlement of first leg of SDF
Settlement of first leg of SLF.

MLNS Batch from LankaClear:
Final Cut-off Time
Closure of System for business
SLIPS Cycle 3:
No  further  inputs  are  accepted. With  the closure of system 
for business, queue/Settlement processing will cease and 
any  transactions  still  in  queues  will  be rejected by the 
system.

End-of-day  (EOD)  processes  e.g.  generate reports/GL  export  
(EOD)  file,  database maintenance  for billing/statement printing
purposes.

Commence  shutting  down  of  RTGS/SSS application software, 
obtain off-line backups.
